title: Nick Faldo's Championship Golf
text: Nick Faldo's Championship Golf is a third-person <a href="golf">golf</a> <a href="video%20game">video game</a>, which <a href="Grandslam%20Entertainment">Grandslam Entertainment</a> published for <a href="Amiga">Amiga</a>, <a href="Amiga%20CD32">Amiga CD32</a>, <a href="Commodore%2064">Commodore 64</a>, and <a href="MS-DOS">MS-DOS</a> between 1992 and 1994. It centers around the fame of British golf champion <a href="Nick%20Faldo">Nick Faldo</a>.
